title: "Analyze results"
author: "Apara Venkat"
date: "4/25/2022"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}

V <- 50
A <- 3
n <- 1000
num_reps <- 1000

path_name <- paste0("../Results/V", V, "_A", A, "_n", n, ".rds")


# path_name <- "../Results/V50_A3_n1000.rds"

results <- readRDS(path_name)
errors <- results$errors
errors$adj_ratio <- errors$adj_err / errors$G_err
errors$rrc_ratio <- errors$rrc_err / errors$G_err
errors$mcd_ratio <- errors$mcd_err / errors$G_err

means <- colMeans(errors, na.rm=T)

cat("Errors:\n----\n")
cat("\tadj.0:", means[7], "\n")
cat("\tida.M:", means[8], "\n")
cat("\tida.R:", means[9], "\n")

adj_missing <- length(which(is.na(errors$adj_err)))
rrc_missing <- length(which(is.na(errors$rrc_err)))
mcd_missing <- length(which(is.na(errors$mcd_err)))

cat("\nMissing:\n---\n")
cat("\tadj.0:", adj_missing / num_reps * 100, "%\n")
cat("\tida.M:", rrc_missing / num_reps * 100, "%\n")
cat("\tida.R:", mcd_missing / num_reps * 100, "%\n")

```
